post.author: 이진경
post.content:
GTA-Systems Development Manager

  PLEASE NOTE:
If you aren't a match for this role, but are looking for work, we invite you to visit our site - www.gsigroup.com - click on Staffing Services, then on the Search button. This shows a list of our Job Orders which can be applied for online. Please don뭪 respond to this Monster posting by sending your CV \\"on spec\\" (these CVs are set aside to be reviewed later, which can take many weeks). We regret that, as a placement agency, we are unable to assist candidates in obtaining Canadian Work Permits.

Our client has an immediate requirement for a Systems Development Manager (NOT a Project Manager).

Responsibilities:
Manage the development of information technology systems & procedures. Direct the provision of system support. Budget, hire/fire, other related duties. Responsible for team of 14.

Mandatory Skills:
-- Min 10 yrs corporate experience
-- Min 5 yrs as manager of a team, department or division
-- Advanced knowledge of methodologies
-- Technically adept with PowerBuilder, Oracle, PL/SQL, C
-- Must be able to mentor staff.
-- Excellent people management skills
-- These items are nice to have: J2EE, WebSphere, Aix, Thin client

Additional Information
Salary: CAD 80,000.00 to CAD 85,000.00 per year
Bonus could bring package up to 90K.
Position Type: Full Time, Permanent
Ref Code: B9B-3J-ATB  

Contact Information
Gillian Eley
geley@gsigroup.com
GSI International Consulting Group
post.title: GTA-Systems Development Manager
